item.title: Manual of Magnetic Dance glove
item.description: General Overview: The glove sets up a wifi network. The computer running supercollider connects to this network and recieves the sensor data from the glove. In parallel it connects to a second wifi network which provides internet access. Steps: connect the computer running supercollider to the “glove network” access internet via the glove Connect to “glove network” Firstly connect the glove to power. After 3-4 minutes your computer should de- tect a wifi network named MD.

item.title: Glove assembly
item.description: Components needed raspberry pi zero w (rpi zero w is preferred because of size, but this setup is also tested on rpi 3 and rpi 3+) sd card at least 2gb in size the IDE Fantasy rasbian image an i2c sensor in this case a BNO055 4x patch cables Assembly Installing rasbian image to sd card The downloaded image will be in .zip format. All information needed for this step can be found here

item.title: Rasbian image setup
item.description: The image used in this project is based on the rasbian stretch lite Version: November 2018. Wifi functionality For the purpose of this project we need to connect to a “parent” network and setup a “child” network. To achieve this we will need hostapd, dnsmasq, iptables-persistent and some configuration because we want to use the built in wifi as an client to a network (“parent” network) and an access point for a second network (“child” network) at the same time.
